c:atomType.name: ChartClearSelectionMode
c:atomType.c:documentation: Controls if and how the selection can be cleared by the user.

c:atom.name: Manual
c:atom.c:documentation:
The user has no way to explicitly fully clear the selection.
It is still possible to clear the selection, if the selection behavior performs a toggling operation.
Selection can always be cleared by code.

c:atom.name: EmptySpaceClick
c:atom.c:documentation: The user can click on any empty area inside the chart to clear the selection.
